capabilities.name: publish_linkedin_post
capabilities.description: Publish a text post to LinkedIn, optionally including media (images/videos) specified by URL.

capabilities.name: schedule_linkedin_post
capabilities.description: Schedule a text post for LinkedIn at a specific future date and time, optionally including media (images/videos) specified by URL.

capabilities.name: publish_twitter_post
capabilities.description: Publish a text post (tweet) to Twitter.

capabilities.name: analyze_linkedin_chat
capabilities.description: Ask questions about the user's LinkedIn profile, content, or network, with support for multi-turn conversations.

capabilities.name: generate_linkedin_post
capabilities.description: Generate three LinkedIn post variants from any content (article, newsletter, notes, etc.) to optimize engagement.

capabilities.name: get_linkedin_posts
capabilities.description: Retrieve the user's recent LinkedIn posts with engagement metrics.

capabilities.name: get_linkedin_profile
capabilities.description: Retrieve the user's LinkedIn profile information including headline, summary, experience, and education.

capabilities.name: set_linkedin_url
capabilities.description: Set or update the LinkedIn profile URL to analyze. Required before using profile/posts retrieval tools if not set previously.

capabilities.name: refresh_linkedin_profile
capabilities.description: Force a refresh of the LinkedIn profile data to update any recent changes.

capabilities.name: refresh_linkedin_posts
capabilities.description: Force a refresh of LinkedIn posts data to capture recently published content.
